argumentText:
ARGUMENT
r s

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rngisoval.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | rngisoval.2 | |- X = ran G |
| 3 |  | rngisoval.3 | |- J = ( 1st ` S ) |
| 4 |  | rngisoval.4 | |- Y = ran J |
| 5 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( r = R /\ s = S ) -> ( r RngHom s ) = ( R RngHom S ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( 1st ` r ) = ( 1st ` R ) ) |
| 7 | 6, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> ( 1st ` r ) = G ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_rneqd | |- ( r = R -> ran ( 1st ` r ) = ran G ) |
| 9 | 8, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> ran ( 1st ` r ) = X ) |
| 10 |  | #P_f1oeq2 | |- ( ran ( 1st ` r ) = X -> ( f : ran ( 1st ` r ) -1-1-onto-> ran ( 1st ` s ) <-> f : X -1-1-onto-> ran ( 1st ` s ) ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( r = R -> ( f : ran ( 1st ` r ) -1-1-onto-> ran ( 1st ` s ) <-> f : X -1-1-onto-> ran ( 1st ` s ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( s = S -> ( 1st ` s ) = ( 1st ` S ) ) |
| 13 | 12, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( s = S -> ( 1st ` s ) = J ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_rneqd | |- ( s = S -> ran ( 1st ` s ) = ran J ) |
| 15 | 14, 4 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( s = S -> ran ( 1st ` s ) = Y ) |
| 16 |  | #P_f1oeq3 | |- ( ran ( 1st ` s ) = Y -> ( f : X -1-1-onto-> ran ( 1st ` s ) <-> f : X -1-1-onto-> Y ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( s = S -> ( f : X -1-1-onto-> ran ( 1st ` s ) <-> f : X -1-1-onto-> Y ) ) |
| 18 | 11, 17 | #P_sylan9bb | |- ( ( r = R /\ s = S ) -> ( f : ran ( 1st ` r ) -1-1-onto-> ran ( 1st ` s ) <-> f : X -1-1-onto-> Y ) ) |
| 19 | 5, 18 | #P_rabeqbidv | |- ( ( r = R /\ s = S ) -> { f e. ( r RngHom s ) | f : ran ( 1st ` r ) -1-1-onto-> ran ( 1st ` s ) } = { f e. ( R RngHom S ) | f : X -1-1-onto-> Y } ) |
| 20 |  | #P_df-rngoiso | |- RngIso = ( r e. RingOps , s e. RingOps |-> { f e. ( r RngHom s ) | f : ran ( 1st ` r ) -1-1-onto-> ran ( 1st ` s ) } ) |
| 21 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( R RngHom S ) e. _V |
| 22 | 21 | #P_rabex | |- { f e. ( R RngHom S ) | f : X -1-1-onto-> Y } e. _V |
| 23 | 19, 20, 22 | #P_ovmpt2a | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S e. RingOps ) -> ( R RngIso S ) = { f e. ( R RngHom S ) | f : X -1-1-onto-> Y } ) |
